Authors:
Tiara Sousa Cabral, Bianca Denise Silva, Noemia Kazue
Ishikawa, Donis da Silva Alfredo, Ricardo Braga Neto, Charles Roland
Clement, Iuri Goulart Baseia
Title:
A new species and new records of gasteroid fungi
(Basidiomycota) from Central Amazonia, Brazil
Abstract:
Gasteroid fungi species found in Central Amazonia are
described, including the new species Geastrum inpaense and new records
for the American continent (Mutinus fleischeri), for Brazil (Phallus
atrovolvatus and Scleroderma sinnamariense), and for Brazilian Amazonia
(Geastrum lloydianum, G. schweinitzii, Phallus merulinus and
Staheliomyces cinctus). Morphological descriptions, molecular
phylogenetic analysis of the new species, photographs, and taxonomical
remarks are provided.
